when "00000000000000000000000000000000" =>	out_byte <= NOP;
when "00000000000000000000000000000001" =>	out_byte <= ADD_I & R0 & R1 & "0000000000000001";
when "00000000000000000000000000000010" =>	out_byte <= SW & R0 & R1 & "1000000000000000";
when "00000000000000000000000000000011" =>	out_byte <= LW & R0 & R2 & "1000000000000000";
when "00000000000000000000000000000100" =>	out_byte <= AND_I & R2 & R2 & "0000000000000001";
when "00000000000000000000000000000101" =>	out_byte <= BEQ & R0 & R2 & "0000000000001000";
when "00000000000000000000000000000110" =>	out_byte <= ADD_I & R1 & R1 & "0000000000000001";
when "00000000000000000000000000000111" =>	out_byte <= JUMP & "00000000000000000000000010";
when "00000000000000000000000000001000" =>	out_byte <= SUB_I & R1 & R1 & "0000000000000001";
when "00000000000000000000000000001001" =>	out_byte <= JUMP & "00000000000000000000000010";
